import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"创建日志流"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/create_log_stream"} context={"endpoint"} />

为该部署创建一个新的日志流。若给定类型的日志流已存在，则会返回错误。

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"请求"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={undefined} />

<RequestSchema title={"请求体"} body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"oneOf":[{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["siteLocation","ddApiKey","ddTags"],"properties":{"ddApiKey":{"type":"string","description":"用于认证的 Datadog API key。"},"ddTags":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"可选的以逗号分隔的标签列表。这些标签会在每条日志事件中通过 `ddtags` 字段发送到 Datadog。"},"service":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"在 Datadog 中用作特殊标签的服务名称。"},"siteLocation":{"description":"你的 Datadog 部署所在的位置。","type":"string","enum":["US1","US3","US5","EU","US1_FED","AP1"],"title":"Datadog 站点位置"}},"title":"CreateDatadogLogStreamArgs"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["datadog"]}}}],"title":"Datadog"},{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["url","format"],"properties":{"format":{"description":"Webhook 负载的格式。JSONL 为每个请求逐行发送一个对象，JSON 为每个请求发送一个数组。","type":"string","enum":["json","jsonl"],"title":"Webhook 格式"},"url":{"type":"string","description":"用于接收日志的 URL。"}},"title":"CreateWebhookLogStreamArgs"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["webhook"]}}}],"title":"Webhook"},{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["apiKey","datasetName","attributes"],"properties":{"apiKey":{"type":"string","description":"用于认证的 Axiom API key。"},"attributes":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["key","value"],"properties":{"key":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"string"}},"title":"Axiom 属性"},"description":"可选的属性列表。这些是在每条日志事件中发送到 Axiom 的额外字段和值。"},"datasetName":{"type":"string","description":"Axiom 中数据集的名称。日志将发送到该数据集。"},"ingestUrl":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"Axiom 可选的数据摄取端点（ingest endpoint）。"}},"title":"CreateAxiomLogStreamArgs"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["axiom"]}}}],"title":"Axiom"},{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["dsn"],"properties":{"dsn":{"type":"string","description":"用于路由异常的 Sentry Data Source Name (DSN)。"},"tags":{"type":["object","null"],"description":"要添加到所有路由到 Sentry 的事件上的标签。","additionalProperties":{"type":"string"},"propertyNames":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"CreateSentryLogStreamArgs"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["sentry"]}}}],"title":"Sentry"}],"title":"CreateLogStreamArgs"}}},"required":true}} />


<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"oneOf":[{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["id","hmacSecret"],"properties":{"hmacSecret":{"type":"string","description":"使用此密钥验证 webhook 签名。"},"id":{"type":"string"}},"title":"CreateWebhookLogStreamResponse"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["webhook"]}}}],"title":"Webhook"},{"type":"object","title":"Datadog","required":["id","logStreamType"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["datadog"]}}},{"type":"object","title":"Axiom","required":["id","logStreamType"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["axiom"]}}},{"type":"object","title":"Sentry","required":["id","logStreamType"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["sentry"]}}}],"title":"CreateLogStreamResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
